item.title: Rango's appeal
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rango)
item.dc:creator: Rango
item.content:encoded:
What was your type of punishment?:
Ban

What is your SteamID?

Steam Community :: Rango

Verified Weeb.
steamcommunity.com

Who has punished you?
not sure doesn't show my ban when i'm trying to search for it

Why were you punished?
no reason i log in one day and im banned, havent played tf2 in atleast 4-5 months and when i log in m banned

Why should we revoke your punishment?
As i believe i was wrongfully banned.

item.title: My discord ban appeal.
item.author: invalid@example.com (purk)
item.dc:creator: purk
item.content:encoded:
What type of punishment?: Ban

Discord tag?: spoopy purk#6512

Who punished you?: I have no idea.

Why were you banned?: Probably for being a dick./Toxicity

Why should we revoke it?: It's been a month or so and I have became a normal person and it seems unfair for a perm ban. Maybe just change the ban to like 3 days or a week? it would be more fair in my opinion. Yes I am sorry for my actions, I promise I will try to not be so toxic to others after this.

I do have the image of what the...

My discord ban appeal.

item.title: Any Musicians Here?
item.author: invalid@example.com (~Marzanna~)
item.dc:creator: ~Marzanna~
item.content:encoded:
Hai hai~! Marzanna here!
I'm curious if there is any musicians here. If so, what instrument do you enjoy playing and how long have you played it for?

I enjoying playing the piano, I really love it.
I've been playing for about 3 years, I still need more to improve! ;-;
Trying to play Touhou music is a big pain!

item.title: How To Make A Proper Punishment Appeal
item.author: invalid@example.com (Alex.bsp)
item.dc:creator: Alex.bsp
item.content:encoded:
[Important! Please Read: Please don't post unnecessary things on user's appeals]
[Note: If you're appealing a Discord Ban, give us your Discord tag. Example: User#1234]

What was your type of punishment?:
Choose the punishment you've received: Team Ban, Ban, Gag, or Mute.

What is your SteamID?
This is how you find your SteamID:
1. Go to your Steam profile and right click it.
2. Click "Copy Page URL"...

How To Make A Proper Punishment Appeal
